Title: Sandcastle - Documentation Compiler for Managed Class Libraries
Description:
Sandcastle produces accurate, MSDN style, comprehensive documentation by reflecting over the source assemblies and optionally integrating XML Documentation Comments. Sandcastle has the following key features:

* Works with or without authored comments
* Supports Generics and .NET
HomeWiki:
IMPORTANT: Project Status Update

The Sandcastle CodePlex project is no longer under active development by Microsoft and as such, there will be no future releases to this site.

The existing Sandcastle source code has been forked over to Eric Woodruffâ€™s Sandcastle Help File Builder site at http://GitHub.com/EWSoftware/SHFB. This new location is where you should go from this point forward to download the latest version. Eric will be in charge of new releases of Sandcastle from here on out.

Many thanks to Eric for the hard work that he has put into this project over the years. It is awesome to know that Sandcastle will live on under Eric's care!

Please see this discussion for details on the project status: http://sandcastle.codeplex.com/discussions/398496

Project Description
Sandcastle produces accurate, MSDN style, comprehensive documentation by reflecting over the source assemblies and optionally integrating XML Documentation Comments. Sandcastle has the following key features:

* Works with or without authored comments
* Supports Generics and .NET
